entries.name: [](key)
entries.desc: Returns the header field corresponding to the case-insensitive key. For example, a key of “Content-Type” might return “text/html”

entries.name: []=(key, val)
entries.desc: Sets the header field corresponding to the case-insensitive key.

entries.name: add_field(key, val)
entries.desc: Adds a value to a named header field, instead of replacing its value. Second argument val must be a String. See also []=, [] and get_fields.
